text: Ewe ku hun ca dibinin, ezman be stun bilind kiriye, ewa Yezdan e u pase ewi ars (mana) hildaye bine heza xwe (hemi tist hildaye bine heza xwe ca bive wusa ewan dixebitine, her wusa) roj u hiv ji xwe ra ser nerm kiriye, hemusk ji bona dane navdayi diherikin dicin. (Yezdan) buyeren (afirandok) pek tine. (Ewa evan) beratan (ji bona we ra) vedike, bi rasti hevi heye, ku hun bi rast hatina Xudaye xwe bizanin
